name: Kaidex
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

description.en: KAIDEX V3 is #1 Automated Market-making (AMM) Decentralized Exchange (DEX) on KardiaChain, a leading blockchain ecosystem in South East Asia. KAIDEX V3 is designed to supercharge Total Value Locked (TVL) on the KardiaChain Network and strives to be community-focused organization. Anyone providing liquidity on KAIDEX is rewarded with $KDX, a brand new governance token that gives holders control over the platform's future growth and development.
